text:
Home61.com | Miami, FL or willing to relocate

We are looking for a Product Designer in full time or part time.

Home61 is reinventing how real estate is done. Through technology we are changing the way people buy, sell and rent homes. This is an exciting opportunity for anyone interested in shaping the direction and trajectory of a new product. You will be collaborating with a cross disciplinary team (product managers, engineers, designers) in all phases of design from discovery to execution and working directly with the CEO and CTO.

Please send your application and resume to hackernews@home61.com
